articles.title: Bob Dylan lived quietly beside a secret garden in NYC for 20 years. See inside the home, now on sale for $7.25 million. - Business Insider
articles.description: Bob Dylan rented one of 20 homes in an under-the-radar, celebrity-favorite enclave in Manhattan. He liked it so much that he eventually bought it.
articles.content:
A New York City home where Bob Dylan lived quietly for years is for sale.
